p:
Multidrug-resistant influenza strains have been identified in immunocompromised patients. Triple-combination antiviral therapy with amantadine, ribavirin, and oseltamivir has been proposed to treat immunocompromised patients with severe influenza A with resistance to oseltamivir. A randomized trial comparing triple-combination antiviral therapy with oseltamivir alone in high-risk adults demonstrated an effect on viral outcomes but no clinical benefit.
